doc.title: Exclusively Yours
doc.plot: Mike Finch stars in three separate roles as The Boss - a shrewd and focused businessman obsessed with obtaining a sailboat; The Salesman - a ladykiller blind to a potentially lethal office crush; and The Graphic Designer - a fragile artist and the company doormat. What potential does one have when the abuse goes too far? Will he rectify himself for all to see? Will his plan include - GASP! - a GUN!?
